column3:
Are the comments behind each `update-alternatives` instruction, plus the [footnote](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0811e14cabe279c2f8363c76db06ddd5a0c856ed/doc/build-windows.md#footnotes) not enough?

If you are going to make these changes, you should do it for the `32 bit` instructions as well. 
Also needs a proper commit message (squash any fix-ups into a single commit).

@fanquake 
as newbie, footnote is not enough get information before click
I think tell what select mode in construction step clearly!
Thanks feedback
@yunchiri If you are going to make the updates, you can reopen and push changes to this Pull Request, you don't have to open a new one.
